vote.title: Authorize the City Manager to negotiate and execute a ground lease for a term of thirty-nine years with Cypress Creek Forest Lane, LP (Tax Credit Partnership/Tenant), approved as to form by the City Attorney, allowing the construction and operation of Cypress Creek at Forest Lane Apartments located at 11520 North Central Expressway, Dallas, Texas 75243; the lease will be prepared once lenders for the Project are identified and will include commercially reasonable provisions agreed to by the parties and approved as to form by the City Attorney - Estimated Revenue: Lease Revenues Fund $2,153,042.00 (15 years of estimated fees and lease payments)
vote.description: Authorize the City Manager to negotiate and execute a ground lease for a term of thirty-nine years with Cypress Creek Forest Lane, LP (Tax Credit Partnership/Tenant), approved as to form by the City Attorney, allowing the construction and operation of Cypress Creek at Forest Lane Apartments located at 11520 North Central Expressway, Dallas, Texas 75243; the lease will be prepared once lenders for the Project are identified and will include commercially reasonable provisions agreed to by the parties and approved as to form by the City Attorney - Estimated Revenue: Lease Revenues Fund $2,153,042.00 (15 years of estimated fees and lease payments)
